page.title: 03Brailsford Garage.
page.content: Mr Watson and Mrs Cook own the garage in the village.They have owned the garage for nine years.Mr Watson repairs and services cars and vans and Mrs Cook serves the petrol and makes out the bills.They start work at 8.30 in the morning and close at 6.30 in the evening.They sell Roberts Petroleum petrol and Castrol GTX oil. They have about 150 customers a day to buy petrol and other things like sweets from the shop.Mr.Watson said that he had been a car mechanic for nineteen years and he had had to go to college for five years to learn how to do the job.This had been his only job. There were lots of different spanners, screwdrivers and hammers in the garage workshop.The latest piece of equipment was a computerised crypton tuner.Mr.Watson lives next door to the garage in a cottage,both built in 1896
